name: Tower of Cursewell (Prototype)
description:
A short Metroidvania prototype made for the Metroidvania Month 8 game jam. Takes about 5-10 minutes, there are bugs I'm aware of but feel free to try the game out for yourself and leave feedback.

Controls:
Left/Right key: Move
A: Jump/Advance text
S: Sword
Up: Read signs/enter doors/save game at statue
Up + S: Special attack (throwing dagger)
W: Change window size
R: Restart game
M: Map (Only part of the map in this demo)
